subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: A mentally ill British man who shouted abuse at Usain Bolt and threw a beer bottle on the track at the start of the men’s 100-meter Olympic final was found guilty of a public order offense
snippet: A mentally ill British man who shouted abuse at Usain Bolt and threw a beer bottle on the track at the start of the men’s 100-meter Olympic final was found guilty of a public order offense
